item.title: Tenant is blocking pathway, highways England outside his property at 03 Daintry way E9 5JJ. The tenant is also storing a wheelie bin and shopping trolley outside the garden gate causing obstruction. The tenant also uses the shopping trolley to fly tip large amount of household waste around the Trowbridge estate on a regular basis. Someone could please address this anti-social behavior being caused by this individual., 16th August
item.description:

item.title: Long nails sticking out of border of play area covered by bark, 16th August
item.description:
The bark covered play area is bordered by wooden sections. Where some of these wooden sections are missing, long nails are exposed - this is a risk for children playing especially if they trip over the border.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clovelly Way, Crofton, London

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Russell Close, Charlton, London

item.title: Dear local aerial manager could you please address this issue last year summer 2023. where a Tenant at 03 Daintry way E9 5JJ Patrick Joseph Byrne has been going around the Daintry way courtyard with a jet washer washing all the paving stones with a high pressure rised jet washer which has made all paving stones come loose because all the sand and grout has been jet washed at high pressure causing it to come loose and wobbly. The local aerial manager Denise Corbin is aware and she even praised resident on a good job making the area nice But she doesn't realise the damage the resident has caused by making all the paving stones loose now.Hackney council would have to pay to get paving stone relayed reset fixed. Causing problems for elderly residence who cannot walk properly. by stumping their feet on the paving stones and tripping over then have to call for a local ambulance to help the resident in distress up. putting the strain on the ambulance service. Dear Denise Corbin please get your act together. May need further training in her career to benefit residents., 16th August
item.description:
Tenant 03 Daintry way has made all the courtyard paving stones come loose creating a trip hazard for elderly people have to wait for a NHS emergency ambulances to help her up off the floor putting the strain on the NHS service.ASB

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daintry Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructive basal growth of street trees in Lennard Rd including that by no. 68., 16th August
item.description:
69, Lennard Rd, and around another 6 recently heavily-pollarded street trees in Lennard Rd, basal growth is out of control and obstructing or impeding footway use and also interfering with the use of the carriageway (driving, parking and sightline safety pulling our from driveways. Please visit Lennard Rd and base level prune all the trees, not just that by 69 Lennard Rd.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
